document.full_text: 'bengal tiger at the baghdad zoo' is a powerful new drama by rajiv joseph, in which robin williams embodies the creature who becomes the play's questioning conscience.
document.title: theater review | 'bengal tiger at the baghdad zoo': ghostly beast burning bright in iraq
lines_and_colors: 'bengal tiger at the baghdad zoo' is a powerful new drama by rajiv joseph, in which robin williams embodies the creature who becomes the play's questioning conscience.
